experience.description: Developed and optimized data visualization components using TypeScript and React. Improved rendering performance for large datasets by 15% through memoization and efficient state management.

Design and implement scalable backend microservices for Azure using C# and .NET Core. Collaborated with cross-functional teams to migrate legacy authentication services to a containerized Kubernetes environment.
